name: International Journal of Advances in Biology
content: Scope & Topics International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) ISSN : 2394-0808 https://airccse.com/ijab/index.html International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) is a peer-reviewed, open access journal, addresses the impacts and challenges of Biology. The journal documents practical and theoretical results which make a fundamental contribution for the development of Biological sciences and applications. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following: • Biological Clocks • Bioinformatics and Biophysics • Cell, Molecular and Developmental Biology • Developmental Biology • Ecology and Evolutionary Biology • Genetics and Genomics • Neurobiology and Microbiology • Behavior • Organismal Biology and Behavior • Physiology and Systems Biology • Plant Biology • Systematics • Systems Biology • Virology Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers for this journal through Submission System. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this Journal. Important Dates • Submission Deadline: Nov 12, 2022 • Authors Notification: Nov 26, 2022 • Registration & camera – Ready Paper Due: Nov 28, 2022 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us: ijab@airccse.com For more details: https://airccse.com/ijab/index.html Paper Submission System: https://airccse.com/submission/home.html
